column5: The wife and I made it out Saturday for a couple hours casting for some more LSC musky action it was a great day light chop perfect conditions but just like last Saturday they were few and far between. We hit the lake around 6:20 and were fishing by 6:45 we did not move a fish until 9:40 which was right at the major for the morning. I will let the video tell the story non the less it was another great short day on the water with my wife we were done fishing by 10:15
A heartbreaker!!!  Love the birds eye video view though.  Great report!
Beauty Mike. Was that taken with a chest mount or a head mount?
thanks guys  its the chest mount Dan
Nice report, Mike. That kind of a 'sad ending' is still miles better than many have done. Thanks for sharing.
Really enjoy your videos Mike !! Can't wait to get down there.

Thanks guys Jim be sure to LMK when your coming down this year I will be able to get out for sure even if it's in my boat we will get out. I think I need to lend you my Gopro next aug for your trip north
